entries.text: Thank you for calling Customer Support. Please state the reason for your call.
I need to cancel order number 12345 right now! I want to cancel order, it hasn't shipped yet, has it?
Thank you for calling. I can help you with that. Let me pull up order number 12345. Just one moment please.
This is ridiculous. I changed my mind about the product and I don't want it anymore. I need to stop delivery immediately!
Okay, I see order number 12345. It looks like it is still in the processing stage and has not yet shipped. I can certainly cancel that for you.
Good! So just cancel it! And I want to refund my card as soon as possible. This whole thing is a waste of my time.

Absolutely. I have initiated the cancellation for order number 12345. A refund will be processed back to your original payment method. You should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days. You will also receive a confirmation email shortly with details about the cancellation and refund.
7-10 days? Seriously? That's a long time!

I understand your frustration. That is the standard processing time for most banks, but it is often faster. We have processed the refund on our end, and unfortunately, we don't have control over the bank's processing speed. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Well, I guess not. As long as you actually cancel order and I get my money back. Thanks.
You're very welcome. The order is cancelled, and the refund is processing. Thank you for your patience. Have a great day!
Okay, thank you. I appreciate your help.
